bibliographic-data.invention-title: EXTENSIBLE EXAM LANGUAGE (XXL) PROTOCOL FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING

abstract.p: A memory stores a plurality of first data structures, which includes element specific data objects indicating a classification of at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language, and second data structures, which include attribute specific data objects indicating at least one attribute of the segments of the test definition language implemented by a computer. A method for computer-based testing includes authoring a test specification and content of the at least one test using a test definition language, compiling the test specification and content of the at least one test to create a compiled test specification and content, which includes validating the test specification and content, storing the compiled test specification and content to a resource file, and retrieving the compiled test specification and content from the resource file during delivery of the test.

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing includes a test driver (110) that has an executable code that controls the test driver (110) to deliver a test to an examinee, a resource file (120) that stores information relating to data content, presentation format, progression, scoring (164), and/or results (16 6) reporting of the test, which is accessible to the test driver (110) to enabl e the test driver (110) to retrieve the test specification and content and to deliver the test to the examinee, and an expansion module that retrieves the information relating to the data content, the presentation format, the progression, the scoring (164), and/or the results (166) reporting of the te st from the resource file (120) and provides the information to the test driver (110) during delivery of the test, expanding the functionality of the test driver (110)

without necessitating modification to the executable code providing to the expansion module a resource storage element within a resour ce file (120), loading information from the resource storage element into the expansion module during delivery of the test, and providing the information from the expansion module to the test driver (110) during the delivery of th e test.

Method and system for computer based testing using an amalgamated resource file

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing for producing a test and delivering the test to an examinee includes a storage device that has a first storage location, which stores a first segment of a test definition language, and a second storage location, which stores a second segment of the test definition language, a validation expansion module that validates the first segment and the second segment of the test definition language, a test packager that amalgamates the first storage location and the second storage location and transmits the amalgamated segment to the validation expansion module such that the validation expansion module can determine whether the amalgamated segment forms a complete and valid set, and a test driver that has an executable code that controls functionality that enables the test driver to deliver the test to an examinee.

A method of computer-based testing includes validating a first segment of the test definition language, amalgamating the first segment and the second segment of the test definition language, validating an amalgamated segment, such that the amalgamated segment is valid if the amalgamated segment forms a complete and valid set, and amalgamating the first segment and the second segment of the test definition language during a test delivery cycle.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for computer based testing using an amalgamated resource file

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing for producing a test and delivering the test to an examinee includes a storage device that has a first storage location, which stores a first segment of a test definition language, and a second storage location, which stores a second segment of the test definition language, a validation expansion module that validates the first segment and the second segment of the test definition language, a test packager that amalgamates the first storage location and the second storage location and transmits the amalgamated segment to the validation expansion module such that the validation expansion module can determine whether the amalgamated segment forms a complete and valid set, and a test driver that has an executable code that controls functionality that enables the test driver to deliver the test to an examinee.

A method of computer-based testing includes validating a first segment of the test definition language, amalgamating the first segment and the second segment of the test definition language, validating an amalgamated segment, such that the amalgamated segment is valid if the amalgamated segment forms a complete and valid set, and amalgamating the first segment and the second segment of the test definition language during a test delivery cycle.

applicant-name.name: PROMETRIC, A DIVISION OF THOMSON LICENSING, INC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for computer based testing using a non-deterministic exam extensible language (XXL) protocol

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing for producing and delivering a test to an examinee includes a test driver, a storage device that stores the test definition language as a plurality of segments, and a validation expansion module that validates the plurality of segments of the test definition language and writes the at least one of the plurality of segments directly to the storage device. A method of computer-based testing includes instantiating a validation expansion module during a test production cycle and validating the plurality of segments from the source file. The method also includes instantiating the validation expansion module and loading the plurality of segments of the test definition language into the validation expansion module during a test delivery cycle.

applicant-name.name: PROMETRIC, A DIVISION OF THOMSON LICENSING, INC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for computer based testing using a non-deterministic exam extensible language (XXL) protocol

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing for producing and delivering a test to an examinee includes a test driver, a storage device that stores the test definition language as a plurality of segments, and a validation expansion module that validates the plurality of segments of the test definition language and writes the at least one of the plurality of segments directly to the storage device. A method of computer-based testing includes instantiating a validation expansion module during a test production cycle and validating the plurality of segments from the source file. The method also includes instantiating the validation expansion module and loading the plurality of segments of the test definition language into the validation expansion module during a test delivery cycle.

applicant-name.name: PROMETRIC, A DIVISION OF THOMSON LEARNING, INC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for computer based testing using plugins to expand functionality of a test driver

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing includes a test driver that has an executable code that controls the test driver to deliver a test to an examinee, a resource file that stores information relating to data content, presentation format, progression, scoring, printing, timing, and/or results reporting of the test, which is accessible to the test driver to enable the test driver to retrieve the test specification and content and to deliver the test to the examinee, and an expansion module that retrieves the information relating to the data content, the presentation format, the progression, the scoring, printing, timing, and/or the results reporting of the test from the resource file and provides the information to the test driver during delivery of the test, expanding the functionality of the test driver without necessitating modification to the executable code of the test driver.

A method of computer-based testing includes instantiating an expansion module, providing to the expansion module a resource storage element within a resource file, loading information from the resource storage element into the expansion module during delivery of the test, and providing the information from the expansion module to the test driver during the delivery of the test.

applicant-name.name: PROMETRIC, A DIVISION OF THOMSON LEARNING, INC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for computer based testing using plugins to expand functionality of a test driver

- Mar. 13, 2003, International Search Report, from PCT/US02/36288
- Jan. 27, 2003, International Search Report, from PCT/US02/36264

abstract.p: A method and/or system for computer-based testing includes, for example, instantiating an expansion module, and providing to the expansion module a resource storage element within a resource file. The method and/or system also includes, for example loading information from the resource storage element into the expansion module during delivery of the test, and providing the information from the expansion module to the test driver during the delivery of the test. Various alternative embodiments are also disclosed.

applicant-name.name: PROMETRIC, A DIVISION OF THOMSON LEARNING INC,

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for computer based testing using a non-deterministic exam extensible language (XXL) protocol

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing for producing a test and delivering the test to an examinee includes a test driver that has an executable code that controls the test driver, a storage device that has a plurality of storage locations, which store the test definition language as a plurality of segments, and a validation expansion module that validates at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language and writes the at least one of the plurality of segments directly to at least one of the plurality of storage locations in the storage device. A method instantiating a validation expansion module during a test production cycle and loading at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language into the validation expansion module from a source file.

The method also includes validating the at least one of the plurality of segments from the source file and unloading the at least one of the plurality of segments from the validation expansion module into at least one of a plurality of storage elements within a storage device. The method of computer-based testing includes instantiating the validation expansion module during a test delivery cycle, providing to the validation expansion module the at least one of the plurality of storage elements, and loading the at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language from the at least one of the plurality of storage elements into the validation expansion module during a test delivery cycle.

applicant-name.name: PROMETRIC, A DIVISION OF THOMSON LEARNING INC,

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for computer based testing using a non-deterministic exam extensible language (XXL) protocol

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing for producing a test and delivering the test to an examinee includes a test driver that has an executable code that controls the test driver, a storage device that has a plurality of storage locations, which store the test definition language as a plurality of segments, and a validation expansion module that validates at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language and writes the at least one of the plurality of segments directly to at least one of the plurality of storage locations in the storage device. A method instantiating a validation expansion module during a test production cycle and loading at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language into the validation expansion module from a source file.

The method also includes validating the at least one of the plurality of segments from the source file and unloading the at least one of the plurality of segments from the validation expansion module into at least one of a plurality of storage elements within a storage device. The method of computer-based testing includes instantiating the validation expansion module during a test delivery cycle, providing to the validation expansion module the at least one of the plurality of storage elements, and loading the at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language from the at least one of the plurality of storage elements into the validation expansion module during a test delivery cycle.

abstract.p: A method and system for computer-based testing that includes a storage device that has a first storage location, which stores a first segment of a test definition language, and a second storage location, which stores a second segment of the test definition language, a validation expansion module that validates the first segment and the second segment of the test definition language, a test packager that amalgamates the first storage location and the second storage location and transmits the amalgamated segment to the validation expansion module such that the validation expansion module can determine whether the amalgamated segment forms a complete and valid set, and a test driver that has an executable code that controls functionality that enables the test driver to deliver the test to an examinee. The computer-based test provides for producing a test and delivering the test to an examinee.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for computer based testing using customizable templates

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing includes a test driver that delivers the test to an examinee using a display device and controls progression of the test, a template module that stores presentation format information comprising the presentation format of the test, the presentation format information being accessible to the test driver, and a data module that stores data content information comprising the data content of the test, the data content information being accessible to the test driver, the presentation format information combining with the data content information to create the presentation format and the data content of the test.

A method of computer-based testing includes retrieving presentation format information from a template module, the presentation format information dividing the display device into a predetermined number of areas in a predetermined arrangement, retrieving data content information from a data module, and combining the presentation format information and the data content information to create the presentation format and data content of the test.

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing includes a test driver that delivers the test to an examinee using a display device and controls progression of the test, a template module that stores presentation format information comprising the presentation format of the test, the presentation format information being accessible to the test driver, and a data module that stores data content information comprising the data content of the test, the data content information being accessible to the test driver, the presentation format information combining with the data content information to create the presentation format and the data content of the test. A method of computer-based testing includes retrieving presentation format information from a template module, the presentation format information dividing the display device into a predetermined number of areas in a predetermined arrangement, retrieving data content information from a data module, and combining the presentation format information and the data content information to create the presentation format and data content of the test.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING USING CUSTOMIZABLE TEMPLATES
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE TEST INFORMATIQUE UTILISANT DES GABARITS POUVANT ETRE PERSONNALISES

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing includes a test driver that delivers the test to an examinee using a display device and controls progression of the test, a template module that stores presentation format information comprising the presentation format of the test, the presentation format information being accessible to the test driver, and a data module that stores data content information comprising the data content of the test, the data content information being accessible to the test driver, the presentation format information combining with the data content information to create the presentation format and the data content of the test.

A method of computer-based testing includes retrieving presentation format information from a template module, the presentation format information dividing the display device into a predetermined number of areas in a predetermined arrangement, retrieving data content information from a data module, and combining the presentation format information and the data content information to create the presentation format and data content of the test.

A system for computer-based testing includes a test driver that delivers the test to an examinee using a display device and controls progression of the test, a template module that stores presentation format information comprising the presentation format of the test, the presentation format information being accessible to the test driver, and a data module that stores data content information comprising the data content of the test, the data content information being accessible to the test driver, the presentation format information combining with the data content information to create the presentation format and the data content of the test.

A method of computer-based testing includes retrieving presentation format information from a template module, the presentation format information dividing the display device into a predetermined number of areas in a predetermined arrangement, retrieving data content information from a data module, and combining the presentation format information and the data content information to create the presentation format and data content of the test.
L'invention concerne un système de test informatique comprenant un pilote de test qui distribue un test à un candidat à l'aide d'un dispositif d'affichage et commande la progression dudit test
un module de gabarits stockant des informations de format de présentation qui comprend le format de présentation du test, les informations de format de présentation accessibles au pilote de test

et un module de données stockant des informations de contenu de données qui comprend le contenu de données du test, les informations de contenu de données accessibles au pilote de test, les informations de format de présentation étant combinées avec les informations de contenu de données afin de créer le format de présentation et le contenu de données du test.

L'invention concerne également un procédé de test informatique consistant à extraire des informations de format de présentation d'un module de gabarits, lesdites informations de format de présentation divisant le dispositif d'affichage en un nombre prédéterminé de zones agencées selon un ordre prédéfini
à extraire des informations de contenu de données d'un module de données
et à combiner les informations de format de présentation et les informations de contenu de données afin de créer le format de présentation et le contenu de données du test.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING USING CUSTOMIZABLE TEMPLATES
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE TEST INFORMATIQUE UTILISANT DES GABARITS POUVANT ETRE PERSONNALISES

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing includes a test driver that delivers the test to an examinee using a display device and controls progression of the test, a template module that stores presentation format information comprising the presentation format of the test, the presentation format information being accessible to the test driver, and a data module that stores data content information comprising the data content of the test, the data content information being accessible to the test driver, the presentation format information combining with the data content information to create the presentation format and the data content of the test.

A method of computer-based testing includes retrieving presentation format information from a template module, the presentation format information dividing the display device into a predetermined number of areas in a predetermined arrangement, retrieving data content information from a data module, and combining the presentation format information and the data content information to create the presentation format and data content of the test.
L'invention concerne un système de test informatique comprenant un pilote de test qui distribue un test à un candidat à l'aide d'un dispositif d'affichage et commande la progression dudit test
un module de gabarits stockant des informations de format de présentation qui comprend le format de présentation du test, les informations de format de présentation accessibles au pilote de test

et un module de données stockant des informations de contenu de données qui comprend le contenu de données du test, les informations de contenu de données accessibles au pilote de test, les informations de format de présentation étant combinées avec les informations de contenu de données afin de créer le format de présentation et le contenu de données du test.

L'invention concerne également un procédé de test informatique consistant à extraire des informations de format de présentation d'un module de gabarits, lesdites informations de format de présentation divisant le dispositif d'affichage en un nombre prédéterminé de zones agencées selon un ordre prédéfini
à extraire des informations de contenu de données d'un module de données
et à combiner les informations de format de présentation et les informations de contenu de données afin de créer le format de présentation et le contenu de données du test.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: EXTENSIBLE EXAM LANGUAGE XXL PROTOCOL FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING
PROTOCOLE DE LANGAGE (XXL) D'EXAMEN EXTENSIBLE DESTINE A UN TEST INFORMATIQUE

abstract.p: A memory stores a plurality of first data structures, which includes element specific data objects indicating a classification of at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language, and second data structures, which include attribute specific data objects indicating at least one attribute of the segments of the test definition language implemented by a computer. A method for computer-based testing includes authoring a test specification and content of the at least one test using a test definition language, compiling the test specification and content of at least one test to create a compiled test specification and content, which includes validating the test specification and content, storing the compiled test specification and content to a resource file, and retrieving the compiled test specification and content from the resource file during delivery of the test.

Une mémoire stocke une pluralité de premières structures de données comprenant des objets de données spécifiques d'un élément qui indiquent une classification d'au moins une pluralité de segments de langage de définition de test, et des secondes structures de données qui comprennent des objets de données spécifiques d'un attribut indiquant au moins un attribut des segments de langage de définition de test mis en oeuvre par un ordinateur.

Un procédé de test informatique consiste créer une spécification et un contenu de test utilisant le langage de définition de test, à compiler la spécification et le contenu de test afin de créer une spécification et un contenu de test compilés consistant à valider la spécification et le contenu de test, à stocker la spécification et le contenu de test compilés dans un fichier de ressources, et à extraire la spécification et le contenu de test compilés du fichier de ressources pendant la distribution du test.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: EXTENSIBLE EXAM LANGUAGE (XXL) PROTOCOL FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING
PROTOCOLE DE LANGAGE (XXL) D'EXAMEN EXTENSIBLE DESTINE A UN TEST INFORMATIQUE

Un procédé de test informatique consiste créer une spécification et un contenu de test utilisant le langage de définition de test, à compiler la spécification et le contenu de test afin de créer une spécification et un contenu de test compilés consistant à valider la spécification et le contenu de test, à stocker la spécification et le contenu de test compilés dans un fichier de ressources, et à extraire la spécification et le contenu de test compilés du fichier de ressources pendant la distribution du test.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: EXTENSIBLE EXAM LANGUAGE (XXL) PROTOCOL FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING
PROTOCOLE DE LANGAGE (XXL) D'EXAMEN EXTENSIBLE DESTINE A UN TEST INFORMATIQUE

abstract.p: A memory stores a plurality of first data structures, which includes element specific data objects indicating a classification of at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language, and second data structures, which include attribute specific data objects indicating at least one attribute of the segments of the test definition language implemented by a computer. A method for computer-based testing includes authoring a test specification and content of the at least one test using a test definition language, compiling the test specification and content of at least one test to create a compiled test specification and content, which includes validating the test specification and content, storing the compiled test specification and content to a resource file, and retrieving the compiled test specification and content from the resource file during delivery of the test.

Une mémoire stocke une pluralité de premières structures de données comprenant des objets de données spécifiques d'un élément qui indiquent une classification d'au moins une pluralité de segments de langage de définition de test, et des secondes structures de données qui comprennent des objets de données spécifiques d'un attribut indiquant au moins un attribut des segments de langage de définition de test mis en oeuvre par un ordinateur.

Un procédé de test informatique consiste créer une spécification et un contenu de test utilisant le langage de définition de test, à compiler la spécification et le contenu de test afin de créer une spécification et un contenu de test compilés consistant à valider la spécification et le contenu de test, à stocker la spécification et le contenu de test compilés dans un fichier de ressources, et à extraire la spécification et le contenu de test compilés du fichier de ressources pendant la distribution du test.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING USING A NON-DETERMINISTIC EXAM EXTENSIBLE LANGUAGE (XXL) PROTOCOL
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE TEST INFORMATIQUE UTILISANT UN PROTOCOLE DE LANGAGE (XXL) D'EXAMEN EXTENSIBLE NON DETERMINISTE

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing for producing a test and delivering the test to an examinee includes a test driver that has an executable code that controls the test driver, a storage device that has a plurality of storage locations, which store the test definition language as a plurality of segments, and a validation expansion module that validates at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language and writes the at least one of the plurality of segments directly to at least one of the plurality of storage locations in the storage device. A method instantiating a validation expansion module during a test production cycle and loading at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language into the validation expansion module from a source file.

The method also includes validating the at least one of the plurality of segments from the source file and unloading the at least one of the plurality of segments from the validation expansion module into at least one of a plurality of storage elements within a storage device. The method of computer-based testing includes instantiating the validation expansion module during a test delivery cycle, providing to the validation expansion module the at least one of the plurality of storage elements, and loading the at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language form the at least one of the plurality of storage elements into the validation expansion module during a test delivery cycle.

L'invention concerne un système de test informatique destiné à produire un test et à le distribuer à un candidat. Ledit système comprend un pilote de test comprenant un code exécutable qui commande ledit pilote de test, un dispositif de stockage comprenant une pluralité d'emplacements de stockage qui stockent le langage de définition de test sous forme d'une pluralité de segments, et un module d'extension de validation permettant de valider au moins la pluralité de segments de langage de définition de test et d'écrire au moins la pluralité de segments directement dans l'un des emplacements de stockage du dispositif de stockage.

L'invention concerne également un procédé permettant d'instancier un module d'extension de validation pendant un cycle de production de test et de charger au moins l'un des segments du langage de définition de test dans ledit module d'extension de validation à partir d'un fichier source. L'invention concerne en outre un procédé consistant à valider la pluralité de segments à partir d'un fichier source et à décharger cette pluralité de segments à partir du module d'extension de validation dans la pluralité d'éléments de stockage dans le dispositif de stockage.

Le procédé de test informatique consiste à instancier le module d'extension de validation pendant un cycle de distribution de test, à fournir ledit module d'extension de validation à la pluralité d'éléments de stockage, et à charger la pluralité de segments de langage de définition de test à partir de la pluralité d'éléments de stockage dans le module d'extension de validation pendant un cycle de distribution de test.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING USING A NON-DETERMINISTIC EXAM EXTENSIBLE LANGUAGE (XXL) PROTOCOL
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE TEST INFORMATIQUE UTILISANT UN PROTOCOLE DE LANGAGE (XXL) D'EXAMEN EXTENSIBLE NON DETERMINISTE

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing for producing a test and delivering the test to an examinee includes a test driver that has an executable code that controls the test driver, a storage device that has a plurality of storage locations, which store the test definition language as a plurality of segments, and a validation expansion module that validates at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language and writes the at least one of the plurality of segments directly to at least one of the plurality of storage locations in the storage device. A method instantiating a validation expansion module during a test production cycle and loading at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language into the validation expansion module from a source file.

The method also includes validating the at least one of the plurality of segments from the source file and unloading the at least one of the plurality of segments from the validation expansion module into at least one of a plurality of storage elements within a storage device. The method of computer-based testing includes instantiating the validation expansion module during a test delivery cycle, providing to the validation expansion module the at least one of the plurality of storage elements, and loading the at least one of the plurality of segments of the test definition language form the at least one of the plurality of storage elements into the validation expansion module during a test delivery cycle.

L'invention concerne un système de test informatique destiné à produire un test et à le distribuer à un candidat. Ledit système comprend un pilote de test comprenant un code exécutable qui commande ledit pilote de test, un dispositif de stockage comprenant une pluralité d'emplacements de stockage qui stockent le langage de définition de test sous forme d'une pluralité de segments, et un module d'extension de validation permettant de valider au moins la pluralité de segments de langage de définition de test et d'écrire au moins la pluralité de segments directement dans l'un des emplacements de stockage du dispositif de stockage.

L'invention concerne également un procédé permettant d'instancier un module d'extension de validation pendant un cycle de production de test et de charger au moins l'un des segments du langage de définition de test dans ledit module d'extension de validation à partir d'un fichier source. L'invention concerne en outre un procédé consistant à valider la pluralité de segments à partir d'un fichier source et à décharger cette pluralité de segments à partir du module d'extension de validation dans la pluralité d'éléments de stockage dans le dispositif de stockage.

Le procédé de test informatique consiste à instancier le module d'extension de validation pendant un cycle de distribution de test, à fournir ledit module d'extension de validation à la pluralité d'éléments de stockage, et à charger la pluralité de segments de langage de définition de test à partir de la pluralité d'éléments de stockage dans le module d'extension de validation pendant un cycle de distribution de test.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING USING PLUGINS TO EXPAND FUNCTIONALITY OF A TEST DRIVER
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE TEST INFORMATIQUE AU MOYEN DE PLUGICIELS EN VUE D'ETENDRE LES FONCTIONNALITES D'UN GESTIONNAIRE DE TEST

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing includes a test driver (110) that has an executable code that controls the test driver (110) to deliver a test to an examinee, a resource file (120) that stores information relating to data content, presentation format, progression, scoring (164), and/or results (166) reporting of the test, which is accessible to the test driver (110) to enable the test driver (110) to retrieve the test specification and content and to deliver the test to the examinee, and an expansion module that retrieves the information relating to the data content, the presentation format, the progression, the scoring (164), and/or the results (166) reporting of the test from the resource file (120) and provides the information to the test driver (110) during delivery of the test, expanding the functionality of the test driver (110)

without necessitating modification to the executable code providing to the expansion module a resource storage element within a resource file (120), loading information from the resource storage element into the expansion module during delivery of the test, and providing the information from the expansion module to the test driver (110) during the delivery of the test.

L'invention concerne un système de test informatique comprenant un gestionnaire de test (110) présentant un code exécutable commandant le gestionnaire de test (110) afin que ce dernier fournisse un test à un candidat, un fichier ressources (120) stockant des informations ayant trait au contenu de données, au format de présentation, à la progression, à la notation (164) et/ou à l'établissement de rapports relatant les résultats du test (166), accessibles au gestionnaire (110) afin de permettre à celui-ci de rechercher la spécification et le contenu du test et de transmettre le test au candidat, et un module d'expansion destiné à trouver l'information ayant trait au contenu des données, au format de présentation, à la progression, à la notation (164) et/ou aux résultats du test à partir des fichiers ressources (120)

et à fournir l'information au gestionnaire de test (110) lors de la remise du test, à accroître la fonctionnalité du gestionnaire de test (110) sans qu'il y ait lieu de modifier le code exécutable, tout en fournissant au module d'expansion un élément de mémorisation des ressources dans un fichier ressources (120), et en chargeant l'information de l'élément de mémorisation des ressources dans le module d'expansion lors de la remise du test, avec transmission de l'information du module d'expansion au gestionnaire de test (110) lors de la remise du test..

applicant-name.name: PROMETRIC, A DIVISION OF THOMSON LEARNING, INC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING USING AN AMALGAMATED RESOURCE FILE
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE TESTS ASSISTES PAR ORDINATEUR, FAISANT APPEL A UN FICHIER DE RESSOURCES AMALGAMEES

abstract.p: A system for computer-based testing for producing a test and delivering the test to an examinee includes a storage device that has a first storage location, which stores a first segment of a test definition language, and a second storage location, which stores a second segment of the test definition language, a test packager that amalgamates the first storage location and the second storage location and transmits the amalgamated segment to the validation expansion module such that the validation expansion module can determine whether the amalgamated segment forms a complete and valid set, and a test driver that has an executable code that controls functionality that enables the test driver to deliver the test to an examinee.

A method of computer-based testing includes validating a first segment of the test definiton language, amalgamating the first segment, such that the amalgamated segment is valid if the amalgamated segment forms a complete and valid set, and amalgamating the first segment and the second segment of the test definition language during a test delivery cycle.

L'invention concerne un système de tests assistés par ordinateur, permettant de produire un test et de le fournir à un candidat. Ledit système comprend : un dispositif de stockage possédant un premier lieu de stockage, qui stocke un premier segment d'un langage de définition de tests, et un second lieu de stockage, qui stocke un second segment du langage de définition de tests
un module d'expansion de validation, qui valide les premier et second segments du langage de définition de tests

un intégrateur de tests, qui amalgame les premier et second lieux de stockage et transmet le segment amalgamé au module d'expansion de validation, afin que ce dernier puisse déterminer si le segment amalgamé forme un ensemble complet et valide

et un pilote de tests, qui possède un code exécutable commandant une fonction permettant au pilote de tests de fournir le test donné à un candidat. Un procédé de tests assistés par ordinateur consiste à valider un premier segment du langage de définition de tests, à amalgamer les premier et second segments du langage de définition de tests, à valider un segment amalgamé, de telle sorte que le segment amalgamé soit valide s'il forme un ensemble complet et valide, et à amalgamer les premier et second segments du langage de définition de tests pendant un cycle de fourniture de tests.

applicant-name.name: PROMETRIC, A DIVISION OF THOMSON LEARNING, INC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING USING AN AMALGAMATED RESOURCE FILE
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE TESTS ASSISTES PAR ORDINATEUR, FAISANT APPEL A UN FICHIER DE RESSOURCES AMALGAMEES

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR COMPUTER BASED TESTING USING AN AMALGAMATED RESOURCE FILE
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE TESTS ASSISTES PAR ORDINATEUR, FAISANT APPEL A UN FICHIER DE RESSOURCES AMALGAMEES

abstract.p: A system and method for computer-based testing (100) for producing a test and delivering the test to an examinee includes a storage device (130) that has a first storage location, which stores a first segment of a test definition language, and a second storage location, which stores a second segment of the test definition language, a validation expansion module that validates the first segment and the second segment of the test definition language, a test packager that amalgamates the first storage location and the second storage location and transmits the amalgamated segment to the validation expansion module such that the validation expansion module can determine whether the amalgamated segment forms a complete and valid set, and a test driver (110) that has an executable code that controls functionality that enables the test driver (110) to deliver the test to an examinee.

L'invention concerne un système de tests assistés par ordinateur, permettant de produire un test et de le fournir à un candidat. Ledit système comprend : un dispositif de stockage possédant un premier lieu de stockage, qui stocke un premier segment d'un langage de définition de tests, et un second lieu de stockage, qui stocke un second segment du langage de définition de tests
un module d'expansion de validation, qui valide les premier et second segments du langage de définition de tests

un intégrateur de tests, qui amalgame les premier et second lieux de stockage et transmet le segment amalgamé au module d'expansion de validation, afin que ce dernier puisse déterminer si le segment amalgamé forme un ensemble complet et valide

et un pilote de tests, qui possède un code exécutable commandant une fonction permettant au pilote de tests de fournir le test donné à un candidat. Un procédé de tests assistés par ordinateur consiste à valider un premier segment du langage de définition de tests, à amalgamer les premier et second segments du langage de définition de tests, à valider un segment amalgamé, de telle sorte que le segment amalgamé soit valide s'il forme un ensemble complet et valide, et à amalgamer les premier et second segments du langage de définition de tests pendant un cycle de fourniture de tests.
